title: crash when proc_macro produces invalid byte string literal

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I was messing around and hit this: ### Code ```Rust // lib.rs #[proc_macro] pub fn oopsy(input: proc_macro::TokenStream) -> proc_macro::TokenStream { "b\"😊\"".parse().unwrap() } // tests/test.rs #[test] fn crash() { crate::oopsy!("anything"); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b commit-date: 2021-09-06 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.55.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` also checked: ``` rustc 1.57.0-nightly (003d8d3f5 2021-10-04) rustc 1.56.0-beta.3 (deef86610 2021-09-17) ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: bpos.to_u32() >= mbc.pos.to_u32() + mbc.bytes as u32', compiler/rustc_span/src/lib.rs:1611:17 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.55.0 (c8dfcfe04 2021-09-06) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: bpos.to_u32() >= mbc.pos.to_u32() + mbc.bytes as u32', compiler/rustc_span/src/lib.rs:1611:17 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic 3: rustc_span::SourceFile::lookup_file_pos 4: rustc_span::SourceFile::lookup_file_pos_with_col_display 5: rustc_span::source_map::SourceMap::lookup_char_pos 6: rustc_errors::emitter::FileWithAnnotatedLines::collect_annotations 7: rustc_errors::emitter::EmitterWriter::emit_message_default 8: ::emit_diagnostic 9: rustc_errors::json::Diagnostic::from_errors_diagnostic 10: ::emit_diagnostic 11: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::emit_diagnostic 12: rustc_errors::diagnostic_builder::DiagnosticBuilder::emit 13: rustc_parse::lexer::unescape_error_reporting::emit_unescape_error 14: rustc_lexer::unescape::unescape_literal 15: rustc_parse::lexer::StringReader::next_token 16: rustc_parse::lexer::tokentrees::TokenTreesReader::parse_all_token_trees 17: rustc_parse::lexer::parse_token_trees 18: rustc_parse::maybe_file_to_stream 19: rustc_parse::source_file_to_stream 20: rustc_parse::parse_stream_from_source_str 21: as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once 22: > as proc_macro::bridge::server::DispatcherTrait>::dispatch 23: as core::convert::From<&mut F>>::from::call 24: proc_macro::bridge::closure::Closure::call at /rustc/c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b/library/proc_macro/src/bridge/closure.rs:27:18 25: proc_macro::bridge::client::TokenStream::from_str::{{closure}} at /rustc/c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b/library/proc_macro/src/bridge/client.rs:244:25 26: proc_macro::bridge::client::::with::{{closure}} at /rustc/c8dfcfe046a7680554bf4eb612bad840e7631c4b/library/proc_macro/src/bridge/client.rs:336:47 27:
